/**
 *  ICU <specials> source: <path>/xml/main/ps.xml
 *  Chrome Note: This locale data is abridged to contain categories
 *  actually used by Chrome.
 */
ps{
    AuxExemplarCharacters{"[\u200C \u200D]"}
    ExemplarCharacters{
        "[\u200C \u200D \u064E \u0650 \u064F \u064B \u064D \u064C \u0651 \u0652 \u0654 \u0670 آ ا أ"
        " ء ب پ ت ټ ث ج ځ چ څ ح-د ډ ذ ر ړ ز ژ ږ س ش ښ ص-غ ف ق ک ګ ل-ن ڼ ه ة و ؤ ی ي ې"
        " ۍ ئ]"
    }
    Languages{
        ps{"پښتو"}
    }
    LocaleScript{
        "Arab",
    }
    Version{"1.68"}
    layout{
        characters{"right-to-left"}
        lines{"top-to-bottom"}
    }
}
